content.prompt: The primary purpose of the Peace of Augsburg (1555) was to

choices.label: end the wars between the Hapsburgs and the Valois
end the civil war between Lutherans and Roman Catholics in the German states
create better trade relations among German princes
facilitate diplomatic relations between the Holy Roman Empire and the Ottoman Turks

topic.text: 2.8: Causation in the Age of Reformation and the Wars of Religion

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
